episodes.synopsis: Viewers share their favorite comical home videos. This episode features a clip of a dog who pulls a woman around the house by her shirt.
episodes.title: The Nincompoop’s Guide to Child Development, To Grandmother's House we Go, and Bad Dog!

episodes.synopsis: Viewers share their favorite comical home videos. This episode features a tot who does an amazing impression of President George W. Bush.

episodes.synopsis: Viewers share their favorite comic home videos. This episode features close encounters with our furry -- and scaly -- friends.

episodes.synopsis: Viewers share their favorite comical home videos. In this episode, prizewinners compete for the ultimate pay-off of $100,000.

video.title: America's Funniest Home Videos Kids: Playtime Ain't for Wimps
video.synopsis: Tom Bergeron hosts this "AFV" series dedicated to that especially funny -- and sometimes painfully dangerous -- time for families.
